title: How to Make Friends + Keep Them
description:
​​We’re back for the summer with a vintage Made For This season as we revisit some of our top episodes from season 1! On today’s episode, we’re talking about how to make friends and how to keep them. You’ll hear some great advice from special guest Kate Allen on how to intentionally pursue friendships when starting from scratch.


Download the friend guide PDF: jennieallen.com

Become one of our texties by texting the word PODCAST to 214-225-6267

Thanks HelloFresh! Go to HelloFresh.com/madeforthis16 and use code MADEFORTHIS16 for up to 16 free meals AND 3 free gifts!
